content: समाधानं {@--1@} Putting together, uniting. {@--2@} Fixing the mind in abstract contemplation on the true nature of spirit. {@--3@} Profound or abstract meditation, deep contemplation. {@--4@} Intentness. {@--5@} Steadiness, composure, peace (as of mind), satisfaction; चित्तस्य समाधानं, बुद्धेः समाधानं <ls>G. L. 18.</ls> {@--6@} Clearing up a doubt, replying to the Pūrvapaksha; answering an objection. {@--7@} Agreeing, promising. {@--8@} (In dramas) A leading incident which unexpectedly gives rise to the whole plot.
